Depending on which status filter is specified, the objects with following status types can be returned:
Status filterReturned status types
AllAll status types
LatestReleasedLatest released excluding out-of-date
DraftOrLatestReleasedDraft and latest released excluding out-of-date
AllReleasedAll released including out-of-date

get.summary: Gets the root folders of types like Data, System, Favorites.

parameters.name: selectedProperties
parameters.description: Selected properties to filter the properties. Default is Id.

parameters.name: fieldGroup
parameters.description: Field group of Metadata fields. Default is None.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Specifies one or more metadata fields to return.

parameters.name: includeLinks
parameters.description: {true} to include the links; otherwise, {false}. Default is {false}.

get.summary: Gets the objects in the folder specified by id.
get.description:
Depending on which object type is specified, the following types can be returned:
Object typeReturned types
AnyFolders and contents
FoldersFolder, ReferenceFolder, PublicationFolder, MapFolder, TopicFolder, LibraryFolder, IllustrationFolder and OtherFolder
ContentsPublication, Map, Topic, Library, Illustration and Other

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Card identifier of the folder whose objects will be returned, e.g. 25432.

parameters.name: objectType
parameters.description: Specifies whether folders, contents or both will be returned. If not supplied, all types will be returned.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language for which to retrieve document metadata fields, e.g. <tt>VLANGUAGEEN</tt>, <tt>en</tt>. If not supplied, the user language will be used.

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description: The resolution for which to retrieve image metadata fields, e.g. <tt>VRESLOW</tt>, <tt>Low</tt>. If not supplied, the system resolution will be used.

parameters.name: selectedProperties
parameters.description: Specifies the properties that will be returned. If not supplied, only the identifier will be returned.

parameters.name: fieldGroup
parameters.description: Group of metadata fields that will be returned. If not supplied, no fields will be returned.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Specifies one or more metadata fields to return.

parameters.name: includeLinks
parameters.description: <tt>true</tt> to include the links; otherwise, <tt>false</tt>. Default is <tt>false</tt>.

parameters.name: includePartialItems
parameters.description: <tt>true</tt> to include partial items when the version or language is missing; otherwise, <tt>false</tt>. Default is <tt>false</tt>.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the folder to delete.
